name: Shogun Showdown (alexy)
description:
Description:

Shogun Showdown is a two-player one hit kill game, where every move matters.

Kill your opponent by either knocking them back into the spikes at the end of the level, or catching them off guard with counter moves

Controls:

P1: 

  • Movement - AD
  • Slash - W
  • Parry - S
  • Stab - T
  • Fake out - R
  • Kick - Y

P2:

  • Movement - Left & Right Arrow Keys
  • Slash - Up Arrow Key
  • Parry - Down Arrow Key
  • Stab - Right Shift 
  • Fake out - Ctrl
  • Kick - Enter
Credits:

Code, Game Design, balancing - John Kim

Art, Game Design - Alex Yin
